result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald J Hecht

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerked by SM. 
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CM70, 15CF79, 15CF96, 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197, 15CF198, 15CF284, 15CF285
Summary provided by State. 
Court questions Defendant.  
15CM70 - Count 1 - Defendant pleads guilty.  Court accepts plea and finds guilty.  Counts 2 & 3 - dismissed and read-in.
15CF79 - State moves to amend Count 1 to misdemeanor battery - 940.19(1) with domestic abuse enhancer.  Court grants amendment to count 1 with the domestic abuse enhancer.  Defendant pleads guilty, Court accepts and finds guilty.  Court dismisses and reads in count 2.
15CF96 - Entire case dismissed and read-in.  Defense has no objection to using cash bond posted towards restitution in other cases.  Court orders $1,000.00 posted be applied to restitution in other cases.
15CF195 Defendant pleads guilty to count 1, Court accepts and finds defendant guilty.  Court dismisses and reads in  counts 2 - 6.  Court orders $2,500.00 cash bond be posted to be used first to restitution in any case.
15CF196 & 15CF197 - Entire cases dismissed and read-in.
15CF198 - Defendant pleads guilty to count 1 & 2, Court accepts and finds guilty of both counts.
15CF284 - Defendant pleads guilty to count 1, Court accepts and finds guilty.  Court dismisses and reads-in counts 2 -4.
15CF285 - Entire case is dismissed and read-in.
Eau Claire County read-in to be filed in 15CF198.  Court dismisses and reads in Eau Claire County case 15CM1013.
Barron County uncharged read-ins on summary sheet, restitution will be ordered. 
Court revokes bond.  PSI ordered on felony cases only.  15CM70 will be sentenced at same time as felony cases.
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THIS COVERS 15CM70, 15CF79, 15CF96, 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197, 15CF198, 15CF284 and 15CF285.

15CF284: Defendant waives formal reading of Information and pleads NG to all counts.
15CF285: Defendant waives formal reading of Information and pleads NG to all counts.

15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197 and 15CF198: Defendant waives formal reading in all files of Information and pleads NG to all counts.

All cases set for plea on 9/11/15 at 11:30 a.m. for 30 minutes.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Rachel Payne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CM70, 15CF96, 15CF79, 15CF196, 15CF198, 15CF195, 15CF197

No agreement yet.
All above reset.
Bond(s) to continue.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Notice of Assignment of Judge. Return to Sender;  No such Number;  Unable to Forward.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
(Clerked by RWinger)
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF195,15CF196,15CF197 and 15CF198.
Defendant waives preliminary hearing on all files. Court accepts the waivers.
Court finds probable cause and binds the Defendant over for trial in all files.
Informations filed.
All files set for arraignment before Judge Babler on 6/22/15 at 2:00 PM.

Defense requests bond modification from a $2,500.00 cash bond to a $1,500.00 cash bond. State objects. Court relates and denies the modification request.  Arraignment scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

THIS BOND COVERS 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197 AND 15CF198

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must have no contact with Maggie H or Alexander D.
Do not write any checks. 
Do not utilize any credit or debit cards.

(Clerked by APavick)
Defendant Ronald J Hecht in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond (for today).  Defendant Ronald J Hecht in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CF195, 15CF196, 15CF197 AND 15CF198

1:10  Court relates and gives appearances.  Blue dean form given to defendant in court.

Defense waives further reading of complaints in above cases.

Preliminary hearing set in all above cases for same date and time.

Bond set to cover all above cases.

  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 15, 2015 at 04:00 pm.
